title: Free Region change
body: Will there be any free region change promotion this year? I'm in NA and would like to transfer to lan, my account is quiet old and would like to keep it instead of create a new one in lan :/ any help or date information would be appreciated.

replies.body: I don't have any info on any upcoming free server transfers, but I'd keep watch on our [**News Page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for any updates on possible future promotions!
Hi :) you can render your account??
Hi I would like to ask where in the game I can buy a change server thank you
in the store, next to purchase rp, you can see the account option, there you can purchase the change
this is not possible until the season ends
